text: If you are at the vicinity area and yet to get full vaccination, you may consider to have your takeaway meal at this park. It's a quiet,clean small park with a shelter that provide seats and table.  I had a breakfast here on a drizzling day so did not stay long to enjoy the quietness as I did not want to be an breakfast entries for the mosquitos.
Cute little park hidden in the neighborhood. Two exercise areas and a newer playground area.
Small and quiet park with covered seating area

Novena Park is a quiet oasis just off Thomson Road. It has some metal exercise stations, benches and footpaths. The place is quiet and shaded and usually deserted.

There are some small boulders, an attempt at some aesthetics here. A pleasant place to read and contemplate.

Halloween Night @ Novena Park
Date : Sunday 27th October ( public holiday on following day:)
Time : 6.30pm - 9.30pm
Venue : Novena Park@ Jalan Novena Estate

Activities highlights
- Treat or trick
- fringe activities / foods
- inflatable bouncy castle
- table games w prizes
- glittering painting
- Halloween Arts Booth
- candy floss
- hotdogs
- ice cream
- magic / ventriloquist show
